ideas.title: OpenAI is looking for a new Head of Preparedness
ideas.description: OpenAI is looking to hire a new executive responsible for studying emerging AI-related risks in areas ranging from computer security to mental health.
hooks: How to Land OpenAI's Most Mysterious Job
Inside the Role Shaping AI's Future Safety

tips: Use screen recordings of AI job application process
Create clear chapter markers for each career step

visualDirection.description: High-contrast tech aesthetic with deep blues and electric accent colors. Dynamic motion graphics showing AI risk landscapes. Clean, technical typography with futuristic undertones. Animated data visualization elements representing risk complexity. Minimal but sophisticated design approach with subtle technological texture overlays.

exampleOutline: Introduction: What is the Head of Preparedness?
Understanding AI Risk Landscape
Key Qualifications and Skills Breakdown
Strategic Approach to AI Safety Challenges
How to Position Yourself for the Role

ideas.title: 10 contrarian leadership truths every leader needs to hear | Matt MacInnis (Rippling)
ideas.description: Rippling's CPO on why you should deliberately understaff projects, how to recognize true product-market fit, why VCs want you to keep failing, and the frameworks that built a $16B company
hooks: Why great leaders break every traditional rule
The counterintuitive playbook of billion-dollar leadership
What VCs don't want you to know

tips: Use archival/interview footage with Matt MacInnis
Include dynamic B-roll of startup/tech environments
Create chapter markers for each contrarian truth

visualDirection.description: High-contrast documentary aesthetic with muted tech-inspired color palette (charcoal, slate blue, burnt orange). Kinetic typography overlaying interview footage. Minimal motion graphics emphasizing data/insights. Inspired by Vice documentaries and modern tech storytelling. Split-screen interview techniques with dynamic data visualization.

exampleOutline: Cold Open: Provocative leadership quote from MacInnis
Background: MacInnis's journey at Rippling
10 Contrarian Leadership Truths (deep dive)
Case Studies & Real-World Examples
Final Call-to-Action: Leadership transformation challenge

ideas.title: India startup funding hits $11B in 2025 as investors grow more selective
ideas.description: Startup funding rounds in India fell sharply in 2025 as investors concentrated capital into fewer companies.
hooks: India's Startup Funding: The $11B Survival Game
Investors Ruthless: Only the Best Survive

tips: Pre-announce live stream with community posts 48hrs ahead
Enable live chat for real-time audience interaction
Prepare pre-submitted audience questions for Q&A segment

visualDirection.description: High-contrast data visualization aesthetic with futuristic dark mode. Dynamic infographic animations showing funding trends. Sharp, angular typography with electric blue and deep charcoal color palette. Animated funding flow graphics with motion tracking investor movement. Clean, tech-forward design that feels both analytical and dramatic.

exampleOutline: Opening: Live Stream Introduction & Energy
Funding Landscape Context & 2025 Overview
Deep Dive: Investor Selection Criteria
Case Studies: Successful vs Struggling Startups
Live Q&A with Audience Interaction

ideas.title: Equity’s 2026 Predictions: AI Agents, Blockbuster IPOs, and the Future of VC
ideas.description: TechCrunch’s Equity crew is bringing 2025 to a close and getting ahead on the year to come with our annual predictions episode! Hosts Kirsten Korosec, Anthony Ha, and Rebecca Bellan were joined by Build Mode host Isabelle Johannessen to dissect the year’s biggest tech developments, from mega AI funding rounds that defied expectations to the rise of “physical AI,” and make […]
hooks: Decode Tech's Future: 5 AI Predictions for 2026
Your Roadmap to Tech's Next Breakthrough
Cracking the Code: AI's Wildest Predictions

tips: Use clear chapter markers for each prediction
Include dynamic infographics for each trend
Create split-screen comparisons of current vs predicted states

visualDirection.description: Futuristic cyberpunk-inspired color palette with electric blues and neon accents. Dynamic typography with angular, tech-forward layouts. Animated transition elements resembling digital data flows. Picture-in-picture screen recordings with holographic overlay graphics. Minimalist but high-contrast design that feels cutting-edge and informative.

exampleOutline: Section 1: Teaser - Why 2026 Will Be a Pivotal Tech Year
Section 2: Context - The Current AI Landscape
Section 3: Step-by-Step Breakdown of 5 Key Predictions
